text:
Hi! I'm Vergie.
I'm a software engineer, I work at IT Vendor company from approximately 2 years ago, but now I already resign and got a new office.
when I work as a software engineer at IT Vendor I hate doing the same thing over and over again and take much of time in development.
So I found a senior that teach me a little about no-code development. I keep exploring that thing over and over. and then I create my own no-code development (still not cool enough).
and apply some of less code on my company framework, and it works perfectly to cut off development time. Still need to learn more to create wonderful framework :slightly_smiling_face:
I need your guidance guys :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks~
